remarks: Condition for two categories with the same hom-sets to have the same composition.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
comfeqd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( comp ` C ) = ( comp ` D ) ) $.
comfeqd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` D ) ) $.
comfeqd $p |- ( ph -> ( comf ` C ) = ( comf ` D ) ) $.
